title: 97/263/EC: Commission Decision of 4 April 1997 suspending the status of a region of the United Kingdom as regards Newcastle disease (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 4 April 1997 suspending the status of a region of the United Kingdom as regards Newcastle disease (Text with EEA relevance) (97/263/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The status of Northern Ireland as Newcastle disease non-vaccinating is suspended.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 198, 17. 7. 1992, p. 56.
